name: Beyond Space (Owls Mountain)
description:
History

Space explorations have always been important for scientific development, but on a certain day, the exploration company UT decided to dominate explorations, destroying any satellite, spacecraft or robots from other companies that were sent for research in space, the other companies created combat ships to try to end the UT, but because it was a suicide mission there was no candidate... but some time later the UT ships were being destroyed but the reason was not known, with a breach found in this environment time a small capsule was released that could record what was happening there, and recordings were made of some strange monsters that were being destroyed, the UT ships fleet and were coming towards Earth.
Faced with such a situation that would threaten the planet, three pilots applied for the suicide mission, which are: Skullet, Niuh, Odalus.

Details

Each pilot has its strengths and weaknesses. The game has two modes, see which one suits you best.

Time to act!!!

Now the salvation of the planet is in your hands, control your pilot, train your skills and free the world from this threat.
